summary: Modifies Whirlwind Sprint to be able to push enemies away as you rush through them, giving this shout the boost it deserves.
descriptionHtml:
*Edit* I finally looked back at this, and removed the effect that prevented the knockback on some occasions. This new file should affect almost everything.


I have always found Whirlwind Sprint a little underwhelming, and almost never used it.

This mod takes the effect of whirlwind cloak from Dragonborn DLC and applies it to Whirlwind Sprint during the duration of the sprint. This causes the enemies you run into to go flying away. And, it will not affect friendly aggro, so you won't get murdered by guards for doing it near them

Its a simple change, but I have noticed that I prefer to use Whirlwind Sprint as one of my main shouts now, which is the result I desired. Feel free to endorse if you enjoy it.

Installation:
NMM or drag the .esp into your Data folder
Dragonborn DLC required



Check out my other mods:
Archer's Toolbox-Augmented Arrows
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31816
author: Chpettmd
